docker¶

/etc/docker/daemon.json 文件配置¶

{
  "registry-mirrors": [
    "https://qcn6j7jf.mirror.aliyuncs.com",
    "https://docker.mirrors.ustc.edu.cn",
    "https://hub-mirror.c.163.com",
    "https://reg-mirror.qiniu.com"
  ],        
  "debug": true 
}
